name: Hi?Hou?Ou: Mou Omae Tobakuchi Kikan!!
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Hi?Hou?Ou" is a sugoroku board game in which players become treasure hunters to go on a hunt for treasure.
About 500 actual and fictional hidden treasures are available!
Instead of the order of crossing the finish line, you compete to be the one who possess the largest amount of money at the end of this treasure hunt . Enjoy!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
??

Content file size?
18MB

and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PS3™ or PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
